subtitles.edit: Edit your business profile picture, information and social media accounts.
subtitles.security: Change your password, enable two-factor authentication, and manage your sign-in devices.
subtitles.privacy: Edit your privacy settings and make your profile visible or invisible in search results.
subtitles.deluxe: Learn about Deluxe membership benefits and manage or create your Deluxe membership.
subtitles.invite: View your invitations and create new invitations.
subtitles.invite-create: Invite an account to this business.
subtitles.users: View and manage users in this business.
subtitles.listings: View and manage listings in this business.
subtitles.listing-detail: View and manage a listing in this business.
subtitles.listing-create: Create a new listing in this business.
subtitles.listing-edit: Edit a listing in this business.

meta.title: Business Profile
meta.description: Edit your Turistikrota business profile, adjust your security and privacy, and change your account settings.
meta.keywords: business profile, business profile edit, business profile settings, business profile security, business profile privacy, business profile account settings
